title: Defeat the Goblins
content:
Defeat the Goblins Objectives

Travel to the Goblin Camp.

There were three figures in the drawing we found. The goblins must have more than one leader.

Defeat the Goblins Walkthrough

If you sides with the druids but still wishes to meet Minthara at the Moonrise Towers, she must be knocked out when fought. This can be done whether at her camp in the Shattered Sanctum or when defending the grove from the goblin attack. If Minthara is knocked out in the goblin camp the party must not take a Long
